title: Rural market rebounds, govt’s capex push to pay dividends: Hero MotoCorp CEO
description: Investors have given a thumbs up to the company’s performance, with its share price on a steady northward movement. Hero MotoCorp CEO Niranjan Gupta deep dives into the strategies the company is undertaking to reinvent itself in a free-wheeling conversation with Sharmistha Mukherjee.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
